languages.text: "Кругом отравленные словеса!" {n}Великан оскаливается, и лицо его темнеет.{/n} "Как я устал от вас, худосочных нелюдей, не ведающих честного боя, погрязших в тине собственных интриг. И утянувших меня с собой. Неужели я, гордый воитель, навек обречен скитаться в вашем убогом логове и убивать одних ксеносов на потеху другим?!" {n}Голос воина искажается, становится гортанным и мало напоминающим человеческий. Ни следа веселой ярости нет в нем, лишь мрачная кровавая жажда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Кругом отравленные словеса!" {n}Великан оскаливается, и лицо его темнеет.{/n} "Как я устал от вас, худосочных нелюдей, не ведающих честного боя, погрязших в тине собственных интриг. И утянувших меня с собой. Неужели я, гордый воитель, навек обречен скитаться в вашем убогом логове и убивать одних ксеносов на потеху другим?!" {n}Голос воина искажается, становится гортанным и мало напоминающим человеческий. Ни следа веселой ярости нет в нем, лишь мрачная кровавая жажда.{/n}

languages.text: "Words, words, poisoned words everywhere!" {n}Ulfar bares his teeth and his expression darkens.{/n} "I am so sick of you puny inhumans who know not of honest battle, steeped in the mire of your own intrigue. You have dragged me into that same mire with you. Is this proud warrior destined to wander your wretched lair forevermore, slaying xenos for other xenos' amusement?" {n}His voice changes, taking on guttural notes and sounding far from human. There is no sign of jovial rage left — only a grim thirst for blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кругом отравленные словеса!" {n}Великан оскаливается, и лицо его темнеет.{/n} "Как я устал от вас, худосочных нелюдей, не ведающих честного боя, погрязших в тине собственных интриг. И утянувших меня с собой. Неужели я, гордый воитель, навек обречен скитаться в вашем убогом логове и убивать одних ксеносов на потеху другим?!" {n}Голос воина искажается, становится гортанным и мало напоминающим человеческий. Ни следа веселой ярости нет в нем, лишь мрачная кровавая жажда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Words, words, poisoned words everywhere!" {n}Ulfar bares his teeth, and his expression darkens.{/n} "How you tire me, sapless inhumans who know not of honest battle, steeped in the mire of your own intrigues. You have dragged me into that same mire with you. Is this proud warrior destined to wander your wretched lair forevermore, slaying xenos for other xenos' amusement?" {n}His voice changes, becoming throaty and not at all human-like. There is no sign of jovial rage left, only a grim thirst for blood.{/n}

"Words, words, poisoned words everywhere!" {n}Ulfar bares his teeth, and his expression darkens.{/n} "How you tire me, sapless inhumans who know not of honest battle, steeped in the mire of your own intrigues. You have dragged me into that same mire with you. Is this proud warrior destined to wander your wretched lair forevermore, slaying xenos for other xenos' amusement?" {n}His voice changes, becoming throaty and not at all human-like. There is no sign of jovial rage left, only a grim thirst for blood.{/n}

You have dragged me into that same mire with you. Is this proud warrior destined to wander your wretched lair forevermore, slaying xenos for other xenos' amusement?" {n}His voice changes, taking on guttural notes and sounding far from human. There is no sign of jovial rage left — only a grim thirst for blood.{/n}

"Words, words, poisoned words everywhere!" {n}Ulfar bares his teeth and his expression darkens.{/n} "I am so sick of you puny inhumans who know not of honest battle, steeped in the mire of your own intrigue. You have dragged me into that same mire with you. Is this proud warrior destined to wander your wretched lair forevermore, slaying xenos for other xenos' amusement?" {n}His voice changes, taking on guttural notes and sounding far from human. There is no sign of jovial rage left — only a grim thirst for blood.{/n}

languages.text: « Paroles et paroles et paroles empoisonnées, partout ! » {n}Ulfar découvre ses dents et son visage s'assombrit.{/n} « Je suis si las de vous, non-humains chétifs, qui ne savent ni se battre dignement ni se dépêtrer de leurs intrigues minables ! Je refuse d'être mêlé à tout ça. Est-ce que le fier guerrier que je suis est vraiment condamné à rester cloîtré dans votre maudite tanière, à tuer des xénos pour en distraire d'autres ? » {n}Sa voix se fait gutturale et son ton n'a plus rien d'humain. Sa rage joviale semble l'avoir totalement quitté, remplacée par une soif de sang inextinguible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Words, words, poisoned words everywhere!" {n}Ulfar bares his teeth and his expression darkens.{/n} "I am so sick of you puny inhumans who know not of honest battle, steeped in the mire of your own intrigue. You have dragged me into that same mire with you. Is this proud warrior destined to wander your wretched lair forevermore, slaying xenos for other xenos' amusement?" {n}His voice changes, taking on guttural notes and sounding far from human. There is no sign of jovial rage left — only a grim thirst for blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Paroles et paroles et paroles empoisonnées, partout ! » {n}Ulfar découvre ses dents et son visage s'assombrit.{/n} « Je suis si las de vous, inhumains chétifs, qui ne savent ni se battre dignement ni se dépêtrer de leurs intrigues minables ! Je refuse d'être mêlé à tout ça. Est-ce que le fier guerrier que je suis est vraiment condamné à rester cloîtré dans votre maudite tanière, à tuer des xénos pour en distraire d'autres ? » {n}Sa voix se fait gutturale et son ton n'a plus rien d'humain. Sa rage joviale semble l'avoir totalement quittée, remplacée par une soif de sang inextinguible.{/n}

languages.text: “真是没完没了！你们的话里简直充满了毒药！”{n}乌尔法呲着牙，脸色阴沉。{/n}“我已经受够你们这些肮脏的异形了。你们从来不会踏踏实实地战斗，只知道搞阴谋诡计，还把我一起拉下了水。难道我这位高傲的战士，注定要在这肮脏的巢穴里游荡，不断地屠杀异形，只为了取悦其他的异形吗？”{n}乌尔法的声音变了，发出了喉音，听起来一点都不像人类的声音。他的语气中没有欢快，也没有愤怒，只有对鲜血的渴望。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Words, words, poisoned words everywhere!" {n}Ulfar bares his teeth and his expression darkens.{/n} "I am so sick of you puny inhumans who know not of honest battle, steeped in the mire of your own intrigue. You have dragged me into that same mire with you. Is this proud warrior destined to wander your wretched lair forevermore, slaying xenos for other xenos' amusement?" {n}His voice changes, taking on guttural notes and sounding far from human. There is no sign of jovial rage left — only a grim thirst for blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “真是没完没了！你们的话里简直充满了毒药！”{n}乌尔法呲着牙，脸色阴沉。{/n}“我已经受够你们这些肮脏的异形了。你们从来不会踏踏实实地战斗，只知道搞阴谋诡计，还把我一起拉下了水。难道我这位高傲的战士，注定要在这肮脏的巢穴里游荡，不断地屠杀异形，只为了取悦其他的异形吗？”{n}乌尔法的声音变了，发出了喉音，变得一点都不像人。他的语气中没有欢快，也没有愤怒，只有对鲜血的渴望。{/n}

languages.text: 「言葉、言葉、毒のある言葉だらけだ！」{n}ウルファーは歯をむき出しにし、顔を曇らせた。{/n}「正々堂々と戦いもせず、泥沼みたいな陰謀にどっぷり浸かった外道なお前らにはうんざりだ。その泥沼に俺を引きずり込んだのはお前だぞ。この誇り高き戦士の運命とは、永遠にお前の粗末な隠れ家をさまよって、異種族連中の快楽のために別の異種族を殺すことなのか？」{n}ウルファーの声がしわがれて人間らしからぬものに変わった。そこに猛々しい怒りは微塵も感じられない。ただ血への渇望だけがあった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Words, words, poisoned words everywhere!" {n}Ulfar bares his teeth and his expression darkens.{/n} "I am so sick of you puny inhumans who know not of honest battle, steeped in the mire of your own intrigue. You have dragged me into that same mire with you. Is this proud warrior destined to wander your wretched lair forevermore, slaying xenos for other xenos' amusement?" {n}His voice changes, taking on guttural notes and sounding far from human. There is no sign of jovial rage left — only a grim thirst for blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「言葉、言葉、毒のある言葉だらけだ！」{n}ウルファーは歯をむき出しにし、顔を曇らせた。{/n}「正々堂々と戦いもせず、泥沼みたいな陰謀にどっぷり浸かった外道なお前らにはうんざりだ。その泥沼に俺を引きずり込んだのはお前だぞ。この誇り高き戦士の運命とは、永遠にお前の粗末な隠れ家をさまよって、ゼノ連中の快楽のために別のゼノを殺すことなのか？」{n}ウルファーの声がしわがれて無感情なものに変わった。そこに猛々しい怒りは微塵も感じられない。ただ血への渇望だけがあった。{/n}

languages.text: "Worte, Worte, alles vergiftete Worte!" {n}Ulfar fletscht die Zähne und seine Miene verfinstert sich.{/n} "Ich habe Euch so satt, armselige Nicht-Menschen. Ihr wisst nicht, wie man ehrenwert kämpft und versinkt im Morast Eurer eigenen Intrigen. Genau in diesen Morast habt Ihr mich reingezogen. Ist dieser stolze Krieger dazu bestimmt, auf ewig durch Euer erbärmliches Versteck zu irren und Xenos zum Vergnügen anderer Xenos abzuschlachten?" {n}Der Klang seiner Stimme verändert sich, auf einmal wirkt sie kehlig und alles andere als menschlich. Sein heiterer Groll ist verschwunden – es bleibt nur noch grimmiger Durst nach Blut.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Words, words, poisoned words everywhere!" {n}Ulfar bares his teeth and his expression darkens.{/n} "I am so sick of you puny inhumans who know not of honest battle, steeped in the mire of your own intrigue. You have dragged me into that same mire with you. Is this proud warrior destined to wander your wretched lair forevermore, slaying xenos for other xenos' amusement?" {n}His voice changes, taking on guttural notes and sounding far from human. There is no sign of jovial rage left — only a grim thirst for blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Worte, Worte, alles vergiftete Worte!" {n}Ulfar fletscht seine Zähne und seine Miene verfinstert sich.{/n} "Ich habe Euch so satt, schwache Nicht-Menschen. Ihr wisst nicht, wie man ehrenwert kämpft und versinkt im Morast Eurer eigenen Intrigen. Genau in diesen Morast habt Ihr mich reingezogen. Ist dieser stolze Krieger dazu bestimmt, auf ewig durch Euer erbärmliches Versteck zu irren und Xenos zum Vergnügen anderer Xenos abzuschlachten?" {n}Der Klang seiner Stimme verändert sich, auf einmal wirkt sie kehlig und gar nicht mehr menschlich. Sämtlicher heiterer Groll ist mittlerweile verschwunden – es bleibt nur noch grimmiger Durst nach Blut.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Palabras, palabras, nada más que palabras emponzoñadas!». {n}Ulfar enseña los dientes y su expresión se ensombrece.{/n} «Me ponéis enfermo, inhumanos sin sangre en las venas; estáis metidos hasta el cuello en el cenagal de vuestras propias intrigas y no sabéis lo que es una pelea honrada. Peor aún, me habéis arrastrado a ese mismo cenagal con vosotros. ¿Es que este orgulloso guerrero está abocado a vagar eternamente por vuestra condenada guarida, matando xenos para diversión de otros xenos?». {n}Su voz ha cambiado, adoptando un tono gutural que no parece humano. No queda rastro alguno de su jovial furia; tan solo una terrible sed de sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Words, words, poisoned words everywhere!" {n}Ulfar bares his teeth and his expression darkens.{/n} "I am so sick of you puny inhumans who know not of honest battle, steeped in the mire of your own intrigue. You have dragged me into that same mire with you. Is this proud warrior destined to wander your wretched lair forevermore, slaying xenos for other xenos' amusement?" {n}His voice changes, taking on guttural notes and sounding far from human. There is no sign of jovial rage left — only a grim thirst for blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Palabras, palabras, nada más que palabras emponzoñadas!». {n}Ulfar enseña los dientes y su expresión se ensombrece.{/n} «Me ponéis enfermo, sois unos inhumanos sin sangre en las venas; estáis metidos hasta el cuello en el cenagal de vuestras propias intrigas y no sabéis lo que es una pelea honrada. Peor aún, me habéis arrastrado a ese mismo cenagal con vosotros. ¿Es que este orgulloso guerrero está abocado a vagar eternamente por vuestra condenada guarida, matando xenos para diversión de otros xenos?». {n}Su voz ha cambiado, adoptando un tono gutural que casi no parece humano. No queda rastro alguno de su jovial furia; tan solo una terrible sed de sangre.{/n}

languages.text: "Laflara bak laflara, zehir fışkırıyor sanki!" {n}Dişlerini sıkan Ulfar'ın yüzüne bir karartı düşüyor.{/n} "Sizin gibi insanlıktan nasibini almamış, dürüstçe dövüşmekten âciz, entrika batağına batmış zavallılardan gına geldi. Beni de entrika batağına sürüklediniz. Bu gururlu savaşçının kaderi, ömür boyu zenolar keyif alsın diye adi ininizde geze geze başka zenoları katletmek mi olmalı?" {n}Gırtlaktan konuşmaya başlayınca sesi değişerek insanlarınkinden uzaklaşıyor. Neşeli hiddetinden iz kalmıyor... Sadece gaddarca bir kana susamışlık hissediliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Words, words, poisoned words everywhere!" {n}Ulfar bares his teeth and his expression darkens.{/n} "I am so sick of you puny inhumans who know not of honest battle, steeped in the mire of your own intrigue. You have dragged me into that same mire with you. Is this proud warrior destined to wander your wretched lair forevermore, slaying xenos for other xenos' amusement?" {n}His voice changes, taking on guttural notes and sounding far from human. There is no sign of jovial rage left — only a grim thirst for blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Laflara bak laflara, zehir fışkırıyor sanki!" {n}Ulfar dişlerini sıkıyor, yüzüne bir karartı düşüyor.{/n} "Sizin gibi insanlıktan nasibini almamış, dürüstçe dövüşmekten âciz, entrika batağına batmış zavallılardan gına geldi artık. Beni de entrika batağına sürüklediniz. Bu gururlu savaşçının kaderi, ömür boyu zenolar keyif alsın diye adi ininizde geze geze başka zenoları katletmek mi olmalı?" {n}Konuşurken sesinde bir değişiklik oluyor. Gırtlaktan konuşmaya başlıyor, sesi insanlıktan uzaklaşıyor. Neşeli hiddetinden iz kalmıyor... Geriye sadece gaddarca bir kana susamışlık kalıyor.{/n}
